<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>"Alas,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> why have you <S%H5674>brought<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H5674>all,<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> to cause us to <S%H6>perish?<s%> I <S%H3863>wish<s%> that we had been <S%H2974>content<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan!<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> "Get <S%H6965>up!<s%> Why are you <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on your face like <S%H6440>that?<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H2398>sinned.<s%> <S%H5674>Yes,<s%> they have even transgressed my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3947>them.<s%> Yes, they have even taken of the devoted <S%H2764>things,<s%> and have also <S%H1589>stolen,<s%> and also <S%H3584>deceived.<s%> They have even <S%H7760>put<s%> it among their own <S%H3627>stuff.<s%>

<S%H1242><s%>"'In the morning therefore you shall be <S%H7126>brought<s%> near by your <S%H7626>tribes.<s%> It shall be that the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3920>selects<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> near by <S%H4940>families.<s%> The <S%H4940>family<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3920>selects<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> near by <S%H1004>households.<s%> The <S%H1004>household<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3920>selects<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> near <S%H1397>man<s%> by <S%H1397>man.<s%>
